original: Bexell, David Vilhelm Fingal Emanuel, kyrkoherde, Borgholm, f. 27/11/ 94 i Tolg, Kronob. 1., av kyrkoh. Fingal B. o. Thyra Rydberg. G. 32 m. skolkökslär. Linnéa Göransson. Barn: Marie-Louise f. 33, Gunilla 35, Christer 38, Eva 45. — Stud:ex. i Växjö 18, folksk :lär :ex. i Strängnäs 19, teol. fil. ex. o. teol. kand. i Lund 28, prakt, teol. ex. samt prästv. f. Växjö stift 29. Stud:res. t. Engl. o. Frankr. 21. E. o. folksk :lär. 19-23, timlär. v. Ulricehamns priv. samsk. 20-21, vik. adj. v. Malmö h. a. 1. delvis ht 28, ämnes- lär. v. Åseda h. folksk. 45-46, tjg. s. v. kommin. i Virestad, v. pastor i Bar-narp o. Huskvarna samt v. pastor o. v. kommin. i Hjortsberga, kommin. i Åseda 32-45, därund. även v. pastor i Åseda 40-41, kyrkoh. i Borgholm 45. Omb. f. Sv. kyrkans miss:styr. 46. Skr.: Från Smål. o. Ölands gamla prästhem (tills. m. H. Pleijel), Historik över Agunnaryds kyrka, Det kyrkliga livet i Åseda, Drag ur biskop David Bexells liv, Då Smålands sonen blev biskop av Tranquebar, minnestal, utfärdstal, griftetal, högmässopredikn. o. söndagsbetraktelser, upps. i ortspressen samt bokanmäln.
translated: Bexell, David Vilhelm Fingal Emanuel, pastor, Borgholm, b. 27/11/94 in Tolg, Kronob. 1., son of pastor Fingal B. and Thyra Rydberg. Married in 1932 to school kitchen teacher Linnéa Göransson. Children: Marie-Louise b. 1933, Gunilla b. 1935, Christer b. 1938, Eva b. 1945. He graduated from Växjö in 1918, received his primary school teaching degree in Strängnäs in 1919, his bachelor's degree in theology and theology candidate degree in Lund in 1928, and his practical theology degree and ordination for the Diocese of Växjö in 1929. He made study trips to England and France in 1921. He worked as a primary school teacher from 1919-1923, hourly teacher at Ulricehamns private school from 1920-1921, substitute pastor at Malmö h. a. 1. partly in 1928, subject teacher at Åseda h. primary school from 1945-1946, serving pastor in Virestad, pastor in Barnarp and Huskvarna, serving pastor and assistant pastor in Hjortsberga, serving pastor in Åseda from 1932-1945, and also serving as assistant pastor in Åseda from 1940-1941. He became the pastor in Borgholm in 1945. He was appointed representative of the Swedish Church's Mission Board in 1946. He wrote: From the Old Priest's Home in Småland and Öland (together with H. Pleijel), History of Agunnaryd Church, The Church Life in Åseda, Sketches from Bishop David Bexell's Life, When the Son of Småland Became Bishop of Tranquebar, memorial speeches, issue speeches, funeral speeches, high mass sermons and Sunday reflections, published in local newspapers and book reviews.

structured.name: David Vilhelm Fingal Emanuel Bexell
